title: BRIEF-India's International Paper APPM Sept-Quarter Net Profit Falls
text:
BRIEF-India's International Paper APPM Sept-Quarter Net Profit Falls

Stock Markets 7 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 17:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's International Paper APPM Sept-Quarter Net Profit Falls Oct 30 (Reuters) - International Paper APPM Ltd : * SEPT-QUARTER NET PROFIT AFTER TAX 79.3 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 374.4 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * SEPT-QUARTER REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 2.72 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 3.36 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO

BRIEF-India's International Paper APPM Sept-Quarter Net Profit Falls
